DataElement.preferredName: Current Therapy Autoimmune Disease Administration Ind
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response used to determine whether or not therapeutic agents are currently being administered to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process of a condition in which the body recognizes its own tissues as foreign and directs an immune response against them.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Current Therapeutic Procedure Autoimmune Disease Administration
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._A condition in which the body recognizes its own tissues as foreign and directs an immune response against them._The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: A condition in which the body recognizes its own tissues as foreign and directs an immune response against them.:The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.

Concepts.definition: A disorder resulting from loss of function or tissue destruction of an organ or multiple organs, arising from humoral or cellular immune responses of the individual to his own tissue constituents. It may be systemic (e.g., systemic lupus erythematosus), or organ specific, (e.g., thyroiditis).
The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient actively receiving treatment for this autoimmune disease?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have an active autoimmune disease that has required systemic treatment (i.e., with use of disease modifying agents, corticosteroids or immunosuppressive drugs)?
